section_title: CONVENTION ARTICLE 6 (education, training and public awareness)
sentences: The Secretariat introduced the item (FCCC/SBI/2010/2, 3 and 9).
The DOMINICAN REPUBLIC emphasized that the New Delhi Work Programme should be extended and improved.
350.ORG called for recognizing of the role of NGOs and youth in the implementation of Convention Article 6.
emphasized the close linkages between masculinity, technology and emissions, where traditional masculine identities support the use of status objects that use a lot of energy.
A contact group will be chaired by Liana Bratasida (Indonesia).
